hero.title:
Vibe Coding
Anytime, Anywhere.
hero.subtitle: Go for a hike, grab a coffee, or just relax. Your AI agents work in the background. We'll notify you via your favorite messaging app only when they need a nod.

showcase.title:
Start on Desktop.
Continue Anywhere. Switch Back Anytime.
showcase.subtitle: Your session lives on your machine. Your phone is just a window. Work locally with native Claude Code or Codex, switch to remote when away, double-space to switch back instantly.

localCore.title: Local Core
localCore.desc: Heavy lifting happens on your powerful desktop machine. No cloud limits.

remoteControl.title: Remote Control
remoteControl.desc: Access everything via PWA or messaging apps. Zero latency feel.

modeSwitch.title: Switch Freely
modeSwitch.desc: Move between terminal and mobile seamlessly. Double-space to return to local. Session state stays perfectly synced.

startAnywhere.title: Start Anywhere
startAnywhere.desc: Launch sessions with Claude, Codex, or Gemini directly from your phone.

seamlessChat.title: Seamless Chat
seamlessChat.desc: Continue your coding conversation exactly where you left off.

reviewCode.title: Review Code
reviewCode.desc: Full syntax highlighting for reviewing changes on the go.

fullTerminal.title: Full Terminal Access
fullTerminal.desc: Execute commands and manage your environment remotely.

powerfulCommands.title: Powerful Commands
powerfulCommands.desc: Use /review, /undo, and more to control the agent efficiently.

manageWorkspaces.title: Manage Workspaces
manageWorkspaces.desc: Switch between multiple active sessions and worktrees instantly.

lifestyle.title: The "Vibe Coding" Lifestyle
lifestyle.subtitle: HAPI isn't just a tool; it's a declaration of independence from your desk.

explore.title: Go Explore
explore.desc: Agents run locally on your powerful desktop. You? You're miles away, enjoying the view.

sip.title: Sip & Approve
sip.desc: Get a ping on your phone. Review the plan. Tap "Approve". Go back to your latte.

walk.title: Walk Away
walk.desc: Literally. Walk away from the screen. HAPI keeps the session alive and secure until you return.

telegram.title: Messaging App Integration
telegram.desc: The perfect balance of distance and control. Get notified via Telegram or other apps only when your input is truly needed.

yolo.title: YOLO Mode
yolo.desc: Trust your agents? Enable YOLO mode to bypass approvals and let them sprint while you sleep.

terminal.title: Full Terminal Access
terminal.desc: Need to step in? You have a full terminal in your pocket. Fix it and forget it.

step1.title: 1. Start on Desktop
step1.desc: Launch HAPI on your machine. It keeps your session alive and ready for remote access.

step2.title: 2. Connect Mobile
step2.desc: Open the PWA or Mini App. You now have full control over your local dev environment.

step3.title: 3. Vibe Code
step3.desc: Let agents do the heavy lifting. Approve changes, run commands, and enjoy your freedom.

cta.title: Ready to Vibe?
cta.subtitle: Join the revolution. Stop watching progress bars and start enjoying your life.

footer.desc:
Vibe Coding Anytime, Anywhere.
The local-first AI agent platform for developers who love freedom.
